column4: hi folks, I have problem with skype, it doesn't play back the voice, why?
does other audio work, in other programs?
is there a volume setting under preferences in your skype program, or something to change the audio backend settings?
do you know what backend the program uses (gstreamer maybe)?  is there settings for it?
this is an issue i've heard over and over.  too bad ubuntu doesn't assume some reasonable defaults
